channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: Sui Foundation denies it sold locked staking rewards on Binance
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brayden Lindrea
item.description: Sui was accused of dumping locked and non-circulating staked SUI tokens on Binance.

item.title: FTX sues Dan Friedberg, alleging he used ‘hush money’ to silence whistleblowers
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: The lawsuit claims the former compliance officer paid whistleblowers to stop them from exposing the “true fraudulent nature” of the exchange.

item.title: FTX suspends $500M sale of stake in AI firm Anthropic: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: Multiple buyers were reportedly eyeing up FTX’s stake in the AI firm that was being sold off to recover funds for creditors.

item.title: Bitcoin price surge will come from retail, not institutions: Fireblocks CEO
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: Michael Shaulov believes that while recent Bitcoin ETF filings could see new institutional money flow to Bitcoin, that in itself didn't drive previous price surges.

item.title: Worldcoin confirms it is the cause of mysterious Safe deployments
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: Twitter users noticed thousands of Safe deployments to Optimism, leading to speculation that it may be an attack, but the developer of Worldcoin confirmed that this activity was merely an app migration.

item.title: Nevada financial regulator petitions court to place Prime Trust into receivership
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: The filing suggested Prime Trust had financial liabilities to its users totaling more than $82 million in fiat and $800,000 in crypto.

item.title: New exchange EDX reportedly switching out Paxos’ custody services for Anchorage’s
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The new exchange does not custody customer funds itself to avoid a conflict of interest — and a hot-button issue with the SEC.

item.title: Bitfinex launches P2P trading platform in Venezuela, Argentina and Colombia
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: The launch announcement followed expansion moves by Bitfinex into El Salvador and Chile through licensing and partnerships, respectively.

item.title: New Web3 ID app lets users find each other based on proven interests
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: Quivr allows users to connect multiple apps, including Spotify, Steam and Instagram, to generate behavior-based badges proving their interests.

item.title: Yield Protocol declares full recovery from Euler hack, awaits user token exchange
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The permissionless, collateralized fixed-rate borrowing and lending market restored operations in May and will now switch out user tokens worth $1.5 million.

item.title: Over $204M was lost in Q2 DeFi hacks and scams: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: More than $208.5 million was lost initially, but approximately $4.5 million was recovered, making the total amount of unrecovered funds over $204 million.

item.title: Judge says arguments behind SBF’s motions to dismiss criminal charges are ‘moot or without merit’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: Former FTX CEO Sam Bankman-Fried will likely still face 13 criminal counts over two separate trials starting in October 2023 and March 2024.

item.title: Japanese and Singaporean regulators join forces on crypto pilot project
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: “Decentralized financial ecosystem continues to develop in complexity, and it is important to address emerging risks,” said FSA official Mamoru Yanase.

item.title: Trader weighs in on possible Bitcoin price drivers for remainder of 2023
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Benjamin Pirus
item.description: A popular name on Twitter, trader Michaël van de Poppe was interviewed for the 10th episode of Cointelegraph’s Crypto Trading Secrets podcast.

item.title: Gary Gensler is hurting the little guys for Wall Street
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Omid Malekan
item.description: Securities and Exchange Commission Chair Gary Gensler is working to protect someone, but it’s not American investors.

item.title: 3AC liquidators look to recoup $1.3B from founders
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: The report came precisely one year after a court in the British Virgin Islands ordered Three Arrows Capital into liquidation.

item.title: Web3 firms are spending up to $25M on HK crypto licenses: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: VASP expenditures vary between 20 million and 200 million Hong Kong dollars as firms scramble to find Web3 talent for licensing.

item.title: 13 DeFi leading practices CeFi companies would be wise to emulate
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Cointelegraph Innovation Circle
item.description: To better meet the changing needs and demands of users, CeFi companies should take a close look at what makes DeFi companies appealing.

item.title: Bitcoin bulls grill $31K as Fidelity ETF move fuels BTC price strength
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin manages another attack on $31,000, while traders hope for further BTC price upside in the coming days.

item.title: Mythical Games raises $37M for in-game marketplace in Series C round
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: The company expects to raise another $20 million to $30 million when the full round closes in the coming months.

item.title: Bybit’s MVP license in Dubai ‘very restricted,’ CEO says
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: Once fully licensed in Dubai, Bybit plans to run a full-scope exchange, offering crypto lending, payments, investment and other services.

item.title: How do they compare: Bitcoin IRA vs. traditional IRA
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Andy Edstrom
item.description: When it comes to retirement planning, there are a variety of investment options available to help individuals save for their golden years.

item.title: Google says its next AI ‘Gemini’ will be more powerful than ChatGPT
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: Google DeepMind’s CEO says developers are building on technology from its 2016 AlphaGo model to outfit Gemini to be “more capable” than current large language models.

item.title: Cathie Wood’s ARK reportedly ‘first in line’ for a spot Bitcoin ETF
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: ARK Invest filed for a spot Bitcoin ETF in collaboration with 21Shares long before BlackRock did, and its application is reportedly first in line for the SEC’s approval.

item.title: What is DALL-E, and how does it work?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Alice Ivey
item.description: Discover the process of text-to-image synthesis using DALL-E’s autoencoder architecture and learn how it can transform textual prompts into images.

item.title: Digital pound will be pseudonymous with a focus on privacy: BoE CBDC chief
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: The underpinning technology for the U.K.’s CBDC could use an alternative to blockchain technology.

item.title: 100 tokenized Teslas ‘democratize’ and ‘decentralize’ Web3 ride sharing
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: The co-founders of ELOOP and Peaq told Cointelegraph that tokenizing high-value assets, like a fleet of ride-sharing cars, will help bring Web3 into the mainstream.

item.title: Will $30K be a new springboard for Bitcoin bulls?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: Bitcoin margin and futures markets display strength as institutional appetite surges after multiple spot ETF requests.

item.title: BTC price metric warns that Bitcoin speculators may sell past $33K
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin speculators remain important for BTC price analysis as their profitability nears classic selling levels.

item.title: Riot Platforms to add 33,000 Bitcoin miners ahead of 2024 halving
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brayden Lindrea
item.description: The new rigs will add 7.6 EH/s to the firm’s self-mining capacity, but won’t be installed until the first quarter of 2024.
